import java.math.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
 
class WGHTLIF{
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
    {
        int t;
        BigInteger T,S,Q,R;
        String Tt, St;
        BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        //Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        String input;
        input = in.readLine();
        t = Integer.parseInt(input);
        
        for (int i=0; i<t; i++)
        {
            Tt = in.readLine();
            St = in.readLine();
            T = new BigInteger(Tt);
            S = new BigInteger(St);
            R = T.remainder(S);
            Q = T.divide(S);
            String ans = R + " " + Q;
            System.out.println(ans);
        }
    }
}
